body.p:
Owingsville Bath Co Ky
May 1st 1865
Govr Thos E Bramlett
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

On the 20th day of April 1865, Wilkins Warren committed a most foul murder in this County, by murdering one Adams. Warren has pled he shot Adams twice, cut out one of his testicles, cut off his left ear, and shot in two places. Warren was formerly in the State Service. (6 months) was a Lieutenant is about 33 years of age, Slight man. about 5 feet 10 inches high quick spoken, dark hair and eyes, and generally wears a military coat, high top boots, and checked pants. It is one of the most brutal murders that I ever heard of.. The verdict of the Jury in this case stating these facts have been returned
in my office,,
Given under my hand the date above written
V. B. Young C B C C
